actionConfiguration.body:
with CTE_sumtotal as (
	SELECT video_id,title,name,created_time,
	cast(total_video_views as decimal) as Total_Video_Views,
	cast(total_video_view_total_time as decimal) as Total_Watch_Hrs,
	cast(total_video_impressions as decimal)/1000 as Revenue
	FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
	WHERE case when '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date > '{{moment().add(-1,'day')}}':: date
		then view_date = '{{moment().add(-1,'day')}}':: date 
	else 
		view_date = '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date end
	and length(title) > 0
	AND name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}),
CTE_view_date as (
	SELECT video_id,title,name,created_time,
	cast(total_video_views as decimal) as Total_Video_Views,
	cast(total_video_view_total_time as decimal) as Total_Watch_Hrs,
	cast(total_video_impressions as decimal)/1000 as Revenue
	FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
	WHERE case when '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date > '{{moment().add(-2,'day')}}':: date
		then view_date = '{{moment().add(-1,'day')}}':: date 
	else 
		view_date = '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date end
	and length(title) > 0
	AND name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}})
select coalesce(CTE_sumtotal.title,CTE_view_date.title) as V_title,
CTE_sumtotal.name as channel,
CTE_sumtotal.created_time as Time_Published,
CTE_sumtotal.Total_Video_Views-coalesce(CTE_view_date.Total_Video_Views,0) as Total_Video_Views,
CTE_sumtotal.Total_Watch_Hrs-coalesce(CTE_view_date.Total_Watch_Hrs,0) as Total_Watch_Hrs,
CTE_sumtotal.Revenue-coalesce(CTE_view_date.Revenue,0) as Revenue
from CTE_sumtotal FULL join CTE_view_date on CTE_sumtotal.video_id=CTE_view_date.video_id
where length(CTE_sumtotal.name) > 0
and CTE_sumtotal.Total_Video_Views-coalesce(CTE_view_date.Total_Video_Views,0) > 0;
